title: The Taking of Saipan: Memoirs of Cpl. Richard Meadows & Cpl. Genkichi Ichikawa
description: The Taking of Saipan was the beginning of the end of WWII. Saipan and Tinian Island to the Japanese, were considered the last line of defense for Japan. Saipan would be key to winning the war, Tinian would be key to end it. This is the story of of a young US Marine who finds a Japanese diary on a beach and saves it...
author: Douglas Westfall
